content: row 2 ws sl1 pwise wyif k1 p1tbl 5 times k1 p to last 12 sts k1 p1tbl 6 times row 3 sl1 pwise wyib p1 k1tbl 5 times p1 k to 2 sts bef m kfb k1 sm k to next m sm kfb k to 2 sts bef next m kfb k1 sm k to next m sm kfb k to last 12 sts p1 k1tbl 6 times 4 sts increase d row 4 repeat row 2 work row 1 4 a total of 12 13 14 15 15 15 14 14 12 times you will work the raglan increases back and forth as indicated above until you have achieved your desired v-neck depth being sure to take note of your completed increases before joining you may begin working in the round at any point by following the instructions included in the notes section on page 3 after joining raglan increases will be worked as follows round 1 k1tbl p1 6 times *k to 2 sts bef m kfb k1 sm kfb repeat from * 3 more times k to last 11 sts p1 k1tbl p1 5 times 8 sts increase d round 2 k1tbl p1 6 times k to last 11 sts p1 k1tbl p1 5 times round 3 k1tbl p1 6 times k to 2 sts bef m kfb k1 sm k to next m sm kfb k to 2 sts bef next m kfb k3 sm k to next m sm kfb k to last 11 sts p1 k1tbl p1 5 times 4 sts increase d round 4 repeat round 2 size 1 only work rnds 1-2 one more time all sizes 260 278 296 320 348 364 394 420 450 sts 83 89 99 107 115 121 129 137 147 sts for front 45 48 49 54 59 61 67 72 78 sts for sleeves and 87 93 99 105 115 121 131 139 147 sts for back © sonder yarn co 2024 | www sonderyarnco com | for personal use only turtle dove v-neck | page 5 continue working in the round as follows no more cuff increases until yoke depth measured down the front from sizes 2 4 8 and 9 only bottom of collar is 11 25 11 75 12 25 12 75 13 5 13 75 14 25 work one more round decreasing one st as folls k1 k2tog k 15 15 / 28 5 30 31 32 5 34 5 35 36 38 38 cm to end of round - 44 - 48 - - - 66 68 sts k1tbl p1 6 times k to last 11 sts p1 k1tbl p1 5 times all sizes change to us 7 / 4 5 mm needles round 1 k1tbl p1 to end separate body & sleeves repeat round 1 until cuff measures 2 5 / 6 5 cm maintain rib at front as set and rm as you come to them work across left front sts place the 45 48 49
